actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Banking.
Committee on Banking requested executive comment from Federal Reserve System.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to make the term of the Chairman and Vice Chairman of the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System concurrent with the term of the President of the United States.

summary.text: Makes the term of the Chairman and Vice Chairman of the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System concurrent with the term of the President of the United States.

titles.title: A bill to make the term of the Chairman and Vice Chairman of the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System concurrent with the term of the President of the United States.
